original_text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard, very costly, and anointed the feet of Jesus, and wiped his feet with her hair: and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment.
korean_text: 마리아는 지극히 비싼 향유 곧 순전한 나드 한 근을 가져다가 예수의 발에 붓고 자기 머리털로 그의 발을 닦으니 향유 냄새가 집에 가득하더라

sentences.original_text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 마리아는 한 파운드의 향유를 가져왔고

sentences.original_text: and anointed the feet of Jesus
and wiped his feet with her hair
with the odour of the ointment
